Reviews.Title: Save your money!
Reviews.Author: Girlcat Chucki
Reviews.Content: This is one of those products you'd never buy if you could hold it in your hand before you bought it.  I chose it for my daughter because it was so 'girly', however, there isn't anything else good about the camera.  The screen to view the images on is misrepresented on the picture on the back of the package; in reality is is smaller than a postage stamp.  Also, the screen has such lousy resolution you can hardly tell what you're taking a picture of.  On a side note:the camera won't work if we use rechargeable batteries.I bought my son a VTech camera, which looks a little baby-ish, but is a much better camera, even for my 8 year old daughter.

ProductInfo.Features:
Digital Camera Takes Up To 152 Pictures Without Film
Download Pictures Directly From Computer
Preview Screen To View Pictures
Personalize Digital Camera With Changing Faceplates
ProductInfo.Name: DIGITAL CONCEPTS 27597 VGA Digital Camera
